# Introduction

This Gospel Cantata is about John 9,1pp. What I like about the passage is how complicated the furor within the community plays out, and how almost callously Jesus treats the blind born person, pushing them first into the hub-hub, and then coming to pick them up to finish the conversion process.

Great stuff.

# Texts

The summary can be found here.

The research notes can be found here.
